1.text: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the clear Book.

2.ar: إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَاهُ قُرْآنًا عَرَبِيًّا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
2.text: Indeed, We have sent it down as an Arabic Quran that you might understand.

111.ar: لَقَدْ كَانَ فِي يُوسُفَ وَإِخْوَتِهِ آيَاتٌ لِّلسَّائِلِينَ
111.text: There was certainly in Joseph and his brothers signs for those who ask.

1.text: Say, 'I seek refuge with the Lord of the morning light,'

2.text: from the harm of what He has created,

3.text: and from the darkness when it gathers,

4.text: and from the harm of those who blow on knots,

5.text: and from the harm of an envier when he envies.

1.text: Say, 'I seek refuge with the Lord of mankind,'

4.text: from the evil of the whisperer who withdraws,

5.text: who whispers in the chests of mankind,

6.text: among the jinn and among mankind.
